name: Makolab
tagline: Your Single Point for Digital Transformation
description:
Makolab is the single point for your digital transformation, delivering solutions to digitally transform any venture into a thriving success. Working with some of the largest global businesses, Makolab has a wealth of experience and expertise in fulfilling a diverse range of goals. Our offer includes telecommunications and sales services and platforms including web design, UX, CRM, Business systems, e-commerce, Mobile apps, Semantics, Web Analytics and Graphic design. Our solutions have been and continue to be implemented in over 70 countries across the globe, as well as the development of solutions for private interests and start-ups alike.
Not only do we offer a diverse array of digital renovations, the expertise and professional quality of our service guarantees the best fit between service, product and results. We are an active company in engaging in and developing the very latest trends and technologies, including semantic technologies, and competently incorporate these into our business projects.
Employing over 170 qualified specialists, we have successfully contributed to international projects in multicultural, multilingual settings, and have a comprehensive track record of successful implementations in a variety of industries, including the Real Estate, Automotive, Finance and Insurance sectors.
